original_text: “If you go into your neighbor's vineyard, you may eat your fill of grapes, as many as you wish, but you shall not put any in your bag.
korean_text: 네 이웃의 포도원에 들어갈 때에는 마음대로 그 포도를 배불리 먹어도 되느니라 그러나 그릇에 담지는 말 것이요

sentences.original_text: If you go into your neighbor's vineyard,
you may eat your fill of grapes,
but you shall not put any in your bag.
